description: Kotlin source file implementing a RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying search result videos within an Android app. The adapter manages a list of Video objects, inflates video card layouts, binds video data to views, handles user interactions, and manages focus animations.

classes.name: SearchResultsAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for presenting a list of Video objects in a RecyclerView, reusing existing layout and view holder logic for video cards, handling user interaction, and focus animations.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder for a video card.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds Video data to the ViewHolder and sets up user interaction handlers.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of Video items in the list.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the adapter with a new list of Video objects.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves a Video object at a specified position.
